By now, Jane was crying a little and other males in diapers couldn't help but pass by, a little concerned. A lot of them knew your mother and some of them stared at you angrily. It was a little surprising to be honest...was your mother a popular teacher? You could imagine why.

info.description:
Whether it's an elementary, middle, high school, or college, you've been enrolled in Diaper Academy; a school where all students are required to be diapered at all times while on campus.

Important Guidelines:

1) No blood, gore, death, or excessive violence.
2) Nudity and sexuality is not required, but welcomed.
3) This school is NOT meant to be a punishment, unless directly stated that said character is here as a form of punishment.
4) All student characters MUST be diapered. (Duh)
5) No full-time babying, if it can be helped. (Babying entails treating one as an infant, making them play in a playpen/with baby toys, etc, making character wear baby clothes; onesies, pacifiers, bibs, etc, feeding baby food, forcing character to crawl, use and be spoken to in babytalk)
6) No furry.
7) Please try to use proper grammar, spelling, and punctuation. Also, please try to write at least two lines per chapter, unless a choice chapter was intended.
8) Just have fun.
